text: whenever I'm somewhere and there's a
drive and I always take advantage of it
we didn't have theaters until I was I
think around 15 right before I left
South Africa so we had drive-in theatres
and every Friday my mom and I would go
to the drive-in theater and we would
never know what would play but we would
just go and if it was r-rated she'd hide
me under a blanket cuz it was too far to
drive back seeing a movie they were
black and whites those are the first
movies that I grew up watching growing
up in South Africa there was no material
like there was no celebrity there was no
real knowledge of you know how an actor
became an actor or what a movie really
how you make a movie or you know I was
watching Tom Hanks movies and falling in
love with Tom Hanks without knowing that
his name was Tom Hanks he's a lovely man
my Tom Hanks he can do no wrong in my
books flash I want it to be the mermaid
damn you Daryl Hannah damn you Daryl
Hannah
I didn't play in any school plays I went
to an art school in Johannesburg in
South Africa and I was a ballet student
and I think the only thing that I did
that got me close to the drama students
was that one year I helped out with a
production because they needed a cat
dancing in the background or something
and so since I was a ballet student I
was in one of the productions it's like
a cat dancing in the background but I
didn't never did any plays I were some
homemade outfit it was not great and it
scared me what I really truly loved
about ballet was going onstage and
telling stories my mom and some of my
friends thought it would be funny there
was a local competition modeling
competition in South Africa happening
and they thought it would be funny to to
enter me and they'd send my photo in and
somehow I was voted one of the finalists
and then I was kind of upset until I
realized that one of the prizes was a
trip to Italy so I was like free trip
sure I'll do it I like the noise of
things frying because I like fried
things coffee brewing that friends and
people that I love laughing love the
sound of my dog begging for food I love
when the man of my dreams says I love
you there you go I'm a sucker I'm a
loser
you
